title: 820-2936 turns on in safe mode
message: it suffered oxidation in the SMC region and on the other side, the Mac is slow and goes up in safe mode.  It already replaces the u5701, u5755 and u5750.  PPbus_g3h 12.6V;  PP3v42_g3h 3.42V;  ALL 3.3V;  PLT_RST_L 3.3V;

title: 820-2936 turns on in safe mode
message: Reball SMC ALWAYS when you detect liquid sign close to it.

title: 820-2936 turns on in safe mode
message:
I made the SMC reball, but I'm still in safe mode, it replaces the u6100 chip, it worked, but the serial has changed, please edit ? 

S/N: C17FNQQYH2G


[URL unfurl="true"]https://drive.google.com/file/d/1Laa0avtwwZJDuMs9LS8KpZc-L5KaHxIS/view?usp=sharing[/URL]

title: 820-2936 turns on in safe mode
message:
Is this the backup BIOS from you board?

"it replaces the u6100 chip, it worked"
Do you mean it now works correctly, not slow anymore?

title: 820-2936 turns on in safe mode
message: It is not slower, it normalized after replacing the u6100. this is the backup.

title: 820-2936 turns on in safe mode
message:
I don't understand you correctly.
If that is the original BIOS, was not good; machine didn't work good with it (was slow).
If you replace U6100, did you wrote backup board on it?
If yes, why changed serial number?

Do you have now new U6100 from other board and the serial from new board?
Is that the uploaded file?
In such case ME region must be cleaned, serial number modified and Fsys checksum fixed.

Please, specify which is the case...

title: 820-2936 turns on in safe mode
message: I took a scrap card and removed the chip from it and put it on this Mac that I'm fixing, resolved.  I would not like to put the BIOS file from the old one because it is corrupted.  I need a file with that serial number that I gave you.

title: 820-2936 turns on in safe mode
message:
So the dump uploaded is from the scrap board.
Then ME region MUST be cleaned too, not only changed serial number.
That's the reason I asked you to clarify.
I will make it tomorrow...

title: 820-2936 turns on in safe mode
message: It didn't work out. Mac doesn't give video with this BIOS.

title: 820-2936 turns on in safe mode
message: Check again if the file you've uploaded still works...

title: 820-2936 turns on in safe mode
message:
Sorry, I sent the wrong file. Can you clear this region ME please.
